library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)

install.packages("here")

thisfile = here("raw_data", "DL_SelectFields_2022.zip")

df2022=read_csv(thisfile) %>% clean_name

df9=df2022 |> filer(passengers>0, origin=="LGA")

df9 |> ggplot(aes(month)) + geom_bar()
df9 |> ggplot(aes(month)) + geom_bar(aes(weight=departure_performed))
df9 |> ggplot(aes(month)) + geom_bar(aes(weight=passengers))

df10 = df2022 |> filer(passengers>0, origin=="LGA" | dest=="LGA")
df10 |> ggplot(aes(month)) + geom_bar(aes(weight=passengers))

df11 = df10 |> select(month, passengers, seats, carrier_name, dest, origin)

df12 = df10 |> select(1:5, month, contains("id"))

df13 = df11 |> ggplot(aes(percent_loading)) + geom_histogram() + facet.wrap(-carrier_name, scales="free_y")
